TopicTitle: Looking for astroids in Career mode.

Articles.Content: I have asteroid day and custom asteroids mods installed, I can see asteroids in sandbox mode so I know the mods are working. Can anyone tell me when asteroids start to appear for tracking in career mode?
You have to update the Tracking Center to level 3 before you'll start seeing asteroids.
You'll need a fully upgraded tracking station to see the asteroids in career mode.
